name: Vacation-browser
body:
#Installation steps:

    git clone git://github.com/srinikom/vacation-browser.git
    cd vbr; ls

Follow instructions from here.
http://www.fabulasolutions.com/2010/02/dont-miss-news-and-trends-when-you-are.html
tagline: vacation browser = wget + crontab + filesave/manager. Let's you save screenshots of webpages when you are on vacation so that you don't miss front page stories when you come back
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
